review: So far I'm enjoying this product and would recommend to anyone looking to down grade from Comcast, Cox, or any of the Dish companies!

review: Love it and very easy to install.

review: Easy to set up and works like a charm!

review: Has all the channels I wanted!
author: Danielle Poirier

review: We are thrilled with our Fire TV Stick. It was not hard to install and, after I got an extender for my Wifi (long needed), it worked like a charm. I am just about ready to dump the cable as the Fire TV Stick allows us to watch movies, TV shows and the news without the need for cable TV. I am hoping to save a bundle of money.
author: Samantha Renfro

review: I'm really happy with the decision to purchase a Fire TV stick.😘😘😘😘😘
author: Bertha Hauser

review: Start up instructions were inadequate. No instructions on how to use the remote.
author: Alan Wenner

review: Easy to set up. Low price. Exceeded my expectations.
author: Nicole
